name: BitcoinPriceLookup
0:
”Alexa, ask Bitcoin Check what does a bitcoin cost?”
”What is the price of a bitcoin?”
”How much is a bitcoin today?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bitcoin check
des: This skill lets you check the going rate of a Bitcoin instantly. We'll check with GDAX, the Most Trusted Digital Asset Exchange to quickly calculate and return the value of one Bitcoin (in U.S. Dollars)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
